name: .REPEAKS File Extension
summary: Learn about .REPEAKS files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: REPEAKS files are not meant to be opened outside of Cockos REAPER. You can delete REPEAKS files if needed; REAPER will re-create any REPEAKS files it needs when you open a project or import an audio file.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
